title: Morganas Boobs
body:
I have noticed that in the recent skin update for Morgana they made her boobs smaller and covered them up more. This is unacceptable. The new look does not properly represent the splash art or the skin before the update, especially the exiled Morgana skin. pleas fix this by returning her boobs to their former glory.

These pictures clearly show the reduction in size and change in covering.

replies.body: I agree they need to be bigger and be more shown then beofre infact
All in favor of topless Morgana?
Pool Party Morgana confirmed.
I like this idea.
they should be smaller, i think females should just be removed from the game in general

reported
boobies are lyfe
Sexist.

not at all. I'm not trying to demean women in any way, all i'm saying is that the in game skin doesn't have big boobs, and the splash shows her having big boobs, and i want the in game skin to match the splash. Also try having an argument instead of just saying sexist.

>I think females should just be removed from the game in general

Ok, how does that *not* seem offensive?

This was in retort and not meant to start any argument. For humor's sake, as was the purpose of his comment.
sorry thought you were replying to the boobies are lyfe comment. lol
She can actually stand now... she no longer has back problems because of the reduction surgery she got.
She has wings as a counterbalance :P

They weren't helping cause she was drooping over.

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TbtZsAcAtYA/VJDjqbCmaaI/AAAAAAAAgNQ/3_yj96657wE/s1600/blackthronmorgcompare.jpg
This is just like the Akali Sideboob debacle

How dare you talk dirty about Morgana, how about you shut up you pervert, grow a pair and stop judging champions and riot on female's boobs size. I like the new look of her, if you don't like then play a different champion it's not that hard, so stop complaining!!
^obvious girl gamer who doesnt know what this thread is about is obvious^

I think that her old model is way better visually then the new model with the smaller boobs. Just feels odd to me like disproportional. And Im a chick, and I have no problem to admitting when I play a game I prefer my characters to be physically attractive. So i have no problem saying that yea her chest size in the new model also bothers. 

Thats just another thing that bothers me about alot of chicks who game, is they have to bitch about how the female characters look. So what if the character is scantly clad it is a character in a fictional realm. Theyve been drawing females like this since forever. Also naked none the less. 

But Im sorry when I play a female in a game I want to her to be visually attractive or I honestly wont play the game. And this is coming from a chick.

(sorry about rant) 

Now if this thread really is for something else then ignore what ive just said. lol.

New model itself looks amazing.

Riot just hates tits now.
aha same, im a female too and I totally agree with you, couldnt have said it better.
it's a huge nerf.
They nerfed the wrong thing, we wanted a nerf to the size of *Dark Binding*, not these...
...*still waiting for Legal Annie skin*{{champion:1}}
And you will be waiting for 10 or so years.

1000.

Fixed

Blood splurts form Katarina slashing people's face? Cool. 

Breasts on females? Innapropriate for children.

Honestly on a serious note, this was something I noticed immediately when I saw the texture update on surrender@20... Like it actually STOOD OUT... we are talking an in-game-model here... something almost so miniscule it really doesn't matter, but SERIOUSLY... It was sooo obvious, it struck my heart cords.

Morgana was THE CHAMPION that got me into this game back in S1 (her kit, if you are curious) and screwing with her cosmetics has been something I've been afraid of since Riot went on this "NO MORE SEX" spree. (I think they are covering up this spree with the texture updates... CONSPIRACY SPAWNED/CONFIRMED VIA MORGANA)

You may have made this thread as a joke, or maybe for satire, but I'm sincerely appalled that they went through with this.

Like i said... in-game-model... but still... characters of all sorts (comics, movies, video games, books, YOU NAME IT) should always retain their integrity of originality and dignity as well through the ages. This just put a thorn in Morgana's.

Like it actually STOOD OUT... we are talking an in-game-model here... something almost so miniscule it really doesn't matter, but SERIOUSLY... It was sooo obvious, it struck my heart cords.

Same here buddy.She was the first champ i played on league.At this point they should change the name of the game to League Of Disnee.Hell i bet you can see more cleavage on the disney channel than on LOL.{{champion:105}}
what's a seductress if everything is covered up? they did the same thing to sona...

It's not about being a seductress.  From the images that are posted, the breasts look like they are almost falling out in the old images (which is tasteless).  The new images look more classy.  Not sure on the size reduction, large breasts can look classy without looking like they will fall out.
Her and Janna's boobs were literally on par, and she finally doesn't look like she was painted with radioactive waste.
yknow the same thing will happen to morgana if she gets a boob upgrade she will get compensating nerfs allong with it like sona
Sona's boobs got nerfed tho ;-;
AM I THE ONLY BUTTMAN ON LOL GIVE THAT LADY SOME BOOTYSHORTS!

I don't really notice. The Splash is still gorgeous and now I can play Morg without a skin since the base skin is no longer eye-bleedingly awful.
So true. I love the base skin now, it looks the way it should have been for a long time.

They shat on Sona and Akali's boobs as well.

Something tells me Janna's will be outright removed (Due to the splash), and Ahri's will as well (Again splash... which looks really bad..... rip ahri)

Riot doesnt like boobs anymore.

IronStylus is being held hostage I think.

We must save him.

Suprised that this isn't downvoted with all the caped crusadors of the internet. "We must protect the dignity of this fictional character!"
wait what. Her boobs are the same size. Just covered up.
They're the same size, she's just not leaning forward as much.
Sad. If all you have to worry about are boo a of a video game player.
So Morg should have boobs but Jinx shouldn't?

me lik smol bobs u ogly fok hau deer u seksist niuguh haw there ya ... u disrespekt mai gurlfrend yo cont

DFC is love. DFC is life.
They just need to plain old update morg, her model is absolutely HORRIBLE, and she doesn't exactly fit in with the rest of the characters in league.
